## Getting Started

### Prerequisites

- Docker and Docker Compose installed

### Running the Project

Using Docker Compose:
```bash
docker-compose up -d
```

Using run scripts:
```bash
# Linux/Mac
./run.sh

# Windows
run.bat
```

For detailed setup instructions, see the main README.md file.
